price: 46. Mpe Akoloba na bato wuta mbotama naye, mpe tango akokola, mpe azali kati na bato ya malamu.
arabic: وَيُكَلِّمُ ٱلنَّاسَ فِي ٱلۡمَهۡدِ وَكَهۡلٗا وَمِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wayukallimu al-nāsa fī al-mahdi wakahlan wamina al-ṣāliḥīna
